Rebuke<S>1969</S> not<S>3361</S> an elder<S>4245</S>, but<S>235</S> intreat<S>3870</S> him as<S>5613</S> a father<S>3962</S>; and the younger men<S>3501</S> as<S>5613</S> brethren<S>80</S>;
The elder women<S>4245</S> as<S>5613</S> mothers<S>3384</S>; the younger<S>3501</S> as<S>5613</S> sisters<S>79</S>, with<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> purity<S>47</S>.
Honour<S>5091</S> widows<S>5503</S> that are widows<S>5503</S> indeed<S>3689</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if any<S>1536</S> widow<S>5503</S> have<S>2192</S> children<S>5043</S> or<S>2228</S> nephews<S>1549</S>, let them learn<S>3129</S> first<S>4412</S> to shew piety<S>2151</S> at home<S>2398</S> <S>3624</S>, and<S>2532</S> to requite<S>287</S> <S>591</S> their parents<S>4269</S>: for<S>1063</S> that<S>5124</S> is<S>2076</S> good<S>2570</S> and<S>2532</S> acceptable<S>587</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>. <sup>piety: or, kindness</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> she that is a widow<S>5503</S> indeed<S>3689</S>, and<S>2532</S> desolate<S>3443</S>, trusteth<S>1679</S> in<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> continueth<S>4357</S> in supplications<S>1162</S> and<S>2532</S> prayers<S>4335</S> night<S>3571</S> and<S>2532</S> day<S>2250</S>.
But<S>1161</S> she that liveth in pleasure<S>4684</S> is dead<S>2348</S> while she liveth<S>2198</S>. <sup>in: or, delicately</sup>
And<S>2532</S> these things<S>5023</S> give in charge<S>3853</S>, that<S>2443</S> they may be<S>5600</S> blameless<S>423</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if any<S>1536</S> provide<S>4306</S> not<S>3756</S> for his own<S>2398</S>, and<S>2532</S> specially<S>3122</S> for those of his own house<S>3609</S>, he hath denied<S>720</S> the faith<S>4102</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> worse than<S>5501</S> an infidel<S>571</S>. <sup>house: or, kindred</sup>
Let<S>2639</S> not<S>3361</S> a widow<S>5503</S> be taken into the number<S>2639</S> under<S>1640</S> threescore<S>1835</S> years old<S>2094</S>, having been<S>1096</S> the wife<S>1135</S> of one<S>1520</S> man<S>435</S>, <sup>taken: or, chosen</sup>
Well reported of<S>3140</S> for<S>1722</S> good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S>; if<S>1487</S> she have brought up<S>5044</S> children, if<S>1487</S> she have lodged strangers<S>3580</S>, if<S>1487</S> she have washed<S>3538</S> the saints'<S>40</S> feet<S>4228</S>, if<S>1487</S> she have relieved<S>1884</S> the afflicted<S>2346</S>, if<S>1487</S> she have diligently followed<S>1872</S> every<S>3956</S> good<S>18</S> work<S>2041</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the younger<S>3501</S> widows<S>5503</S> refuse<S>3868</S>: for<S>1063</S> when<S>3752</S> they have begun to wax wanton against<S>2691</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, they will<S>2309</S> marry<S>1060</S>;
Having<S>2192</S> damnation<S>2917</S>, because<S>3754</S> they have cast off<S>114</S> their first<S>4413</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
And<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> withal<S>260</S> they learn<S>3129</S> to be idle<S>692</S>, wandering about<S>4022</S> from house to house<S>3614</S>; and<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> idle<S>692</S>, but<S>235</S> tattlers<S>5397</S> also<S>2532</S> and<S>2532</S> busybodies<S>4021</S>, speaking<S>2980</S> things which<S>3588</S> they ought<S>1163</S> not<S>3361</S>.
I will<S>1014</S> therefore<S>3767</S> that the younger women<S>3501</S> marry<S>1060</S>, bear children<S>5041</S>, guide the house<S>3616</S>, give<S>1325</S> none<S>3367</S> occasion<S>874</S> to the adversary<S>480</S> to<S>5484</S> speak reproachfully<S>3059</S>. <sup>to speak: Gr. for their railing</sup>
For<S>1063</S> some<S>5100</S> are<S>1624</S> already<S>2235</S> turned aside<S>1624</S> after<S>3694</S> Satan<S>4567</S>.
If any<S>1536</S> man<S>4103</S> or<S>2228</S> woman that believeth<S>4103</S> have<S>2192</S> widows<S>5503</S>, let them relieve<S>1884</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> let<S>916</S> not<S>3361</S> the church<S>1577</S> be charged<S>916</S>; that<S>2443</S> it may relieve<S>1884</S> them that are widows<S>5503</S> indeed<S>3689</S>.
Let<S>515</S> the elders<S>4245</S> that rule<S>4291</S> well<S>2573</S> be counted worthy<S>515</S> of double<S>1362</S> honour<S>5092</S>, especially<S>3122</S> they who labour<S>2872</S> in<S>1722</S> the word<S>3056</S> and<S>2532</S> doctrine<S>1319</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> saith<S>3004</S>, <b>Thou shalt<S>5392</S> not<S>3756</S> muzzle<S>5392</S> the ox<S>1016</S> that treadeth out the corn<S>248</S>.</b> And<S>2532</S>, The labourer<S>2040</S> is worthy<S>514</S> of his<S>846</S> reward<S>3408</S>.
Against<S>2596</S> an elder<S>4245</S> receive<S>3858</S> not<S>3361</S> an accusation<S>2724</S>, but<S>1508</S> <S>1622</S> before<S>1909</S> two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S> witnesses<S>3144</S>. <sup>before: or, under</sup>
Them that sin<S>264</S> rebuke<S>1651</S> before<S>1799</S> all<S>3956</S>, that<S>2443</S> others<S>3062</S> also<S>2532</S> may<S>2192</S> fear<S>5401</S>.
I charge<S>1263</S> thee before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> the elect<S>1588</S> angels<S>32</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou observe<S>5442</S> these things<S>5023</S> without<S>5565</S> preferring one before another<S>4299</S>, doing<S>4160</S> nothing<S>3367</S> by<S>2596</S> partiality<S>4346</S>. <sup>preferring: or, prejudice</sup>
Lay<S>2007</S> hands<S>5495</S> suddenly<S>5030</S> on<S>2007</S> no man<S>3367</S>, neither<S>3366</S> be partaker<S>2841</S> of other<S>245</S> men's sins<S>266</S>: keep<S>5083</S> thyself<S>4572</S> pure<S>53</S>.
Drink<S>5202</S> no longer<S>3371</S> water<S>5202</S>, but<S>235</S> use<S>5530</S> a little<S>3641</S> wine<S>3631</S> for<S>1223</S> thy<S>4675</S> stomach's sake<S>4751</S> and<S>2532</S> thine<S>4675</S> often<S>4437</S> infirmities<S>769</S>.
Some<S>5100</S> men's<S>444</S> sins<S>266</S> are<S>1526</S> open beforehand<S>4271</S>, going before<S>4254</S> to<S>1519</S> judgment<S>2920</S>; and<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> some<S>5100</S> men they follow after<S>1872</S>.
Likewise<S>5615</S> also<S>2532</S> the good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S> of some are<S>2076</S> manifest beforehand<S>4271</S>; and<S>2532</S> they that are<S>2192</S> otherwise<S>247</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> be hid<S>2928</S>.
